revised_title: Obituary of William Blaxland Benham: A Pioneering Zoologist and Educator
tldr: William Blaxland Benham was a prominent zoologist and educator, known for his extensive research on earthworms and contributions to the field of zoology. He held various academic positions in the UK and New Zealand, and was a member of several scientific societies. Benham's work in zoology, education, and administration left a lasting impact on the scientific community.
